betmc_features_3@betmc_menu_common.betmc.$betmc_text: World and friends screens have been merged into one

betmc_features_4@betmc_menu_common.betmc.$betmc_text: Force show import world button on mobile devices

betmc_features_5@betmc_menu_common.betmc.$betmc_text: Force show quick play button (it will create a creative world without having to create a manual world)

betmc_features_6@betmc_menu_common.betmc.$betmc_text: Bottom chat lock like java chat

betmc_features_7@betmc_menu_common.betmc.$betmc_text: Show mainhand durability in Hud Screen

betmc_features_8@betmc_menu_common.betmc.$betmc_text: Show inventory item overlay in Hud Screen (press [TAB] to enable, Haven't done it on the mobile yet)

betmc_features_9@betmc_menu_common.betmc.$betmc_text: Show Compass, Clock, Recovery compass on Hud Screen (Recovery compass will be changed after you update to the new version of Minecraft)

betmc_features_10@betmc_menu_common.betm.$betmc_text: Show EXP, Boss percent on Hud Screen

betmc_features_11@betmc_menu_common.betm.$betmc_text: Removes particles when breaking blocks, exploding TNT and when throwing medicine bottles
